pullRequest.title: Added Tests for Blobs
pullRequest.bodyText: Merge after Create container PR is merged (#399)

commit.message: Started setting up ways to get creds and clients
Added support for get container properties
Added a bunch of network tests for container apis
Added some more commit block list tests
Added Access condition tests for blob delete

nodes.bodyText: Should we move any utils methods that are specific to storage or uses storage types to storage-package? core util should not have any dependency on storage or any other azure-sdk modules.

commit.message: Moved blob related things to blobs

nodes.bodyText: Are these not present because we need to add them?
I think we should change the name of this header or possibly remove it
You could also maybe do a commit block list since it'll 400 or something if the block wasn't staged.
